channel.title: Chris Sullivan on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Chris Sullivan on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘This Is Us’ Stars Sterling K. Brown, Mandy Moore and Chris Sullivan to Reunite for ‘That Was Us’ Live
item.description: The special Live Nation presentation, set for the Wiltern on Jan. 17, is being teased as “an evening of conversation and live music.”
